title: Nonlinear Yang-Mills AdS black brane and DC conductivity
abstract:
In this paper, we examine Einstein-Hilbert gravity featuring a cosmological
constant and a non-abelian nonlinear electromagnetic field that is minimally
coupled to gravity. We first present the black brane solution for this model
and subsequently calculate the color non-abelian DC conductivity for this
solution using AdS/CFT duality. Our results retrieve the Yang-Mills model in
the limit as $q_1$ approaches zero.
